text: Hey there! It's time to talk about the 2023-2024 US flu season! 🤧🏻🚨 Preliminary in-season burden estimates are now available, and they're updated weekly. 📈👀 Check out the latest numbers and compare them to previous seasons' end-of-season estimates. 🔍💡 Remember, these estimates are preliminary and may change as new data becomes available. Stay tuned for updates! 😊
